title: [4 Pack: 3ft/6ft/6ft/10ft] Newest Charging Cable, USB Charging Cable, Fast Charging Power Cord, Cable Compatible for iPhone X/8 Plus/7 Plus/6 Plus, iPad Pro/Mini, iPod Touch, Zinc Alloy, Black
features: ❤ Overall Compatibility: The iPhone fast charging and data syncing cable is compatible with iPhone X, iPhone 8 series, iPhone 7 series, iPhone 6 series, iPhone SE, iPhone 5 series, iPad Pro series, iPad mini series, iPad Air, the elder iPad series, iPod touch 5th and 6th generations.
❤ Fast Charging & Data Syncing: The increased thickness than ordinary and the original iPhone power cable promises 30% faster recharging up to 2A and data transmission speed.
❤ Boost Signal Quality: The copper made iPhone Lightning power cable improves the signal quality and strength significantly.
❤ Ultra-Durable: The copper wire itself can survive 4,000+ times 90 degree bend test, and the zinc alloy coated Lightning and USB connectors can endure 10,000 times plugs/unplugs.
❤ Three Lengths: 4 pieces packed inside; 3ft*1, 6ft*2, 10ft*1; can meet various length requests under different circumstances.
description: Universal CompatibilityThe Lightning cables we offer are compatible with most of the iPhone, iPad and iPod touch models, including, iPhone X, iPhone 8 Plus, iPhone 8, iPhone 7 Plus, iPhone 7, iPhone SE, iPhone 6s Plus, iPhone 6s, iPhone 6 Plus, iPhone 6, iPhone 5s, iPhone 5c, iPhone 5, iPad Pro (12.9-inch) 2nd Generation, iPad Pro (12.9-inch) 1st Generation, iPad Pro (9.7-inch), iPad mini 4, iPad Air 2, iPad mini 3, iPad Air, iPad mini 2, iPad mini, iPad (5th generation), iPad (4th generation), iPod touch (6th generation) and iPod touch (5th generation). This means, whichever model of iPhone, iPod touch or iPad you got at hand, as long as they are using the Lightning cables, you are covered.Works with Original Power AdaptorThe iPhone charging cables and data syncing lines we provide can work with your original Apple Power Adaptor perfectly, meaning, you don’t need to buy separate adaptors to go with our cables if you still have your original one. Simply connect the iPhone data cable to the USB adaptor and then plug the adaptor to a wall-mounted socket, or directly plug the data line to the USB dock on a computer, you can recharge your iPhone, iPad or iPod touch model, or synchronize data quickly.Toughly DurableThe durability is a critical factor to a long lifespan. To that end, we use the thicker-diameter copper wire to make the charging and data transmission cable. And we applied additional zinc alloy layer to both ends of the able, the Lighting connector and the USB connector. Our test results report that the cable itself is capable of 4,000 times bending, at 90 degrees, and the two connectors can survive up to 10,000 times of repeated plugs and unplugs.Three Lengths to Meet Different SituationsInside the pack, there are 4 pieces of Lightning cables, with 3 different lengths, one piece in 3 feet, two pieces in 6 feet and another piece in 10 feet.
